messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Unschooler gathering in Maryland March 	21/22
messages.msgSnippet: What an a perfect opportunity to BE around other unschoolers. Especially those farther along the path than you :-) You can see really live unschoolers,
messages.messageBody:
What an a perfect opportunity to BE around other unschoolers. Especially
those farther along the path than you :-) You can see really live
unschoolers, observe, learn, ask questions. IRL is so wonderful, it really
makes a difference. And this great weekend that Zoa put together doesn't
have conference fees so it is perfect for those unsure if a con is "worth"
it :-) (it is!)

Faith
On Thu, Feb 26, 2009 at 10:51 PM, griesellists <griesellists@...>wrote:

> Hey, we're only an hour and a half away in Rockville (north of
> DC)...I'll have to see if I have any days off that weekend...I might
> have Saturday.
>
> Of course, we are kind of newbie unschoolers and my eight year old is
> still deschooling. We have a lot of bad habits to unlearn. I worry
> occasionally that we aren't ready for prime time yet. On the other
> hand, I would really love the chance to meet other families farther
> along on the journey than we are.
>
> Tamara
>
> _
>
>
>



--
http://faithvoid.blogspot.com/
www.bearthmama.com

messages.messageBody:
Newbies are as welcome as more experienced unschoolers at this gathering.
We¹d love to have you and any others thinking of attending.
Zoa

messages.subject: Re: Unschooler gathering in Maryland March 21/22
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, we re only an hour and a half away in Rockville (north of DC)...I ll have to see if I have any days off that weekend...I might have Saturday. Of course,
messages.messageBody:
Hey, we're only an hour and a half away in Rockville (north of
DC)...I'll have to see if I have any days off that weekend...I might
have Saturday.

Of course, we are kind of newbie unschoolers and my eight year old is
still deschooling. We have a lot of bad habits to unlearn. I worry
occasionally that we aren't ready for prime time yet. On the other
hand, I would really love the chance to meet other families farther
along on the journey than we are.

Tamara

messages.subject: Unschooler gathering in Maryland March 21/22
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, I am inviting any and all unschoolers to our Maryland home for a weekend of fun with other unschoolers on March 21/22. All the info about the
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone,

I am inviting any and all unschoolers to our Maryland home for a weekend of
fun with other unschoolers on March 21/22. All the info about the gathering
is right here at this blog.

http://midatlanticunschoolergatherings.blogspot.com

There will be other gatherings hosted by other families in the Mid-Atlantic
area in the future - to be listed on this one blog. Hope to see you at my
house in March or somewhere else in the future!

Ciao,
Zoa
----------------
Zoa Conner, PhD
Physicist and Organic Learning Mother
zoaconner@...
*Handmade stuff @ http://earthyzee.etsy.com
